page.title: 04Workers In The Area
page.content: A control room worker works an 8 hour shift at the{L.O.R plant.}His first job after arriving in the control room is to read the log of the last shift.{ {From the control room units producing {Petrol, Heating Oil and Aviation Fuel} are controlled. A control panel 25 feet long records flows, temperature and pressures continuously through the day. The supervisor must make adjustments and take records of the days events and report any need for repairs. Also inside the works there is the{power station}providing energy for the refinery. A supervisor in the power station has to make sure that there is a constant supply of electricity at a number of voltages and steam at various pressures and continuous supplies of water. It is essential that the plant runs every minute of the day.
